meaningMnemonic: Someone who <kanji>differ</kanji>s in <kanji>gender</kanji> from you is of a <vocabulary>different gender</vocabulary>. This is often used to mean the <vocabulary>opposite sex</vocabulary> in the sense of men as viewed by women and vice versa.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
